name: gld-rest-api
description: GLD REST API - Multifunctional REST API

scripts.deploy: npm run install-all && npm run build && npm run start
scripts.install-all: cd api && npm install && cd ../dashboard/frontend && npm install && cd ../..
scripts.build: cd dashboard/frontend && npm run build && cd ../..
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd api && npm run dev" "cd dashboard/frontend && npm run dev"

author: GLD Solutions
